vanillaProjects.title: Weather API Project
vanillaProjects.description: I built a Three.js scene that grabs weather data from OpenWeather API and displays the current temperature in Vancouver.

vanillaProjects.title: Matter.js Plinko
vanillaProjects.description: Using a physics engine, I made a Plinko game and balanced it as much as possible using y-axis forces and testing peg layouts.

vanillaProjects.title: 3D Bedroom Scene
vanillaProjects.description: As I have a desire for learning 3D design, I created a Three.js scene that resembles a bedroom.

vanillaProjects.title: Music Visualizer
vanillaProjects.description: I created a music visualizer using Three.js and Web Audio API. The visualizer reacts to the music and creates a unique visual experience.

vanillaProjects.title: Simple Backend for Emails (NodeMailer, MongoDB)
vanillaProjects.description: I made a simple backend for an email form with Express.js and Nodemailer
